title: I got S rank but no hex tech chest WTF
body: so i was playing a game and i got S rank but lost does that mean i don't get anything.

replies.body:
There's a few reasons as to why that might be the case;
 
+ As **Exalted Lucina** stated you need to own the champion to unlock chests and keys with them. That means free to play champions will not work.

+ You also can only get one chest per champion each season, as **JasonWazza** said earlier. If you've already obtained a chest from a champion, any further S class games on that champion will not generate a chest. Keys will still be obtainable on that champion though.

+ Lastly, if you have been chat restricted, ranked restricted or banned before, then this feature has been temporarily disabled for you. You can get it back by making progress towards reforming your behavior. 

You can find more info on all the above [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/hextech-crafting-now-live-oceania).
I've just recovered from a 2 week ban (about a month ago or less), and I have access to this feature. Therefore, I do not believe those who have been banned won't receive the benefits.

I'd assume you've reformed yourself then according to the system. But it if you check out the link I sent, down below in the FAQ section it reads:

_"Players who are chat or ranked restricted or currently banned from play cannot earn or unlock chests through Champion Mastery. We want to be sure players punished by our systems are making genuine efforts to reform, so the period of ineligibility can extend beyond the duration of the chat restrictions or suspensions received. If they make significant progress, the rewards will start to appear after games once more."_

Just adding onto Telecasterdude's comment, there's also a cap to the number of chests you can earn (Maximum being 4 being available at any one time, one refreshing each week)
So essentially if you have already earned 4 chests within the first week you've hit the cap, don't worry you'll be able to get another one in a few more days.
Most likely it's one of the other requisites though ^^
Also you can see how many chests you have available on your profile within the league client (as well as what champions you have already earned an S on in the champions tab)
Hope that helped!
